committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to establish a commission to plan observances to commemorate the bicentennial of the Constitution of the United States.

summary.text: American Constitution Bicentennial Commission Act - Establishes the American Constitution Bicentennial Commission to plan observances to commemorate the bicentennial of the Constitution of the United States. Requires the Commission to transmit an annual report to the President and to each House of the Congress.

titles.title: A bill to establish a commission to plan observances to commemorate the bicentennial of the Constitution of the United States.
